title: 'Go for it. Recommended'
body: No fuse provided. Although it's a good product. (I'm writing this review on Day 2. I'll edit this review after a month or two). Looks classic and stylish. Its a 6 socket product I purchased, I use 5 of them .. everything is working fine so far. Individual switches are great and cool. I think 10A 250V 2500W is sufficient enough to safe guard our gadgets. So you can go for it. I searched a ton for a perfect extension box with individual switch and found this one after a long research. Length is perfect as it mentioned. I bought it in Sale for Rs649.

title: 'Excellent but with flimsy switches'
body: 'This is one of the few 3-pin extension boards available with six sockets each having individual switches. All of its six sockets are international-plugs compatible and it is very convenient to switch on/off individual plugs instead of one for all.  The only reason I took one star off is that the individual switches feel little flimsy and shaky as if they would pop off when pressing them on/off.  This product does have the brand name and sticker. The sticker however was not meant for this model but something else :-)'

title: 'Disappointed'
body: 'As soon as I connected my appliances ( TV sound system set-top box ) to the spike the mcb of the main electric box tripped.  I feel more quality checks are required. This product is potential to damage our valuable home appliances/electronic devices.'

title: 'Trustable‚Ä¶'
body: 'This product is trustable and have a top class build and design. Every single pins are perfectly fitting. And the button feels good quality and sturdy.  In my setup 2 of these plugs runs 24x7 (Wifi and Alexa). Other two runs for 9 hours a day (Laptop and Monitor). And I sometimes use Desktop computer and 2.1 home theatre as well.  No issue so far.'
